LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.label: Fractal Warping
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.description: Fractal warping of the body. As flesh toughens and takes on metallic qualities and the mind rots and yet also grows, a uniquely enlightening and agonizing perspective takes hold. This is the archotech's work, but for what inscrutable purpose was this warping manifested?
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.stages.0.label: Transcendant
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.stages.1.label: Blessed
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.stages.2.label: Gifted
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.stages.3.label: Balanced
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.stages.4.label: Tainted
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.stages.5.label: Vile
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillOrganic.stages.6.label: Corrupted
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillMechanical.label: Fractal Integration
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillMechanical.description: Fractal integration into the whole chassis. While the warping that occurs is harmless to the unit, the effects are decidedly double-edged. Indeed, an inflated ego and power consumption increase are the primary effects - although affected units inexplicably take less damage from the same blows, and have a stronger grasp on reality's true nature.\n\nPerhaps archotechs did not design fractal warping with machines in mind, and find its application to them uninteresting? Or, perhaps, fractal warping is a curse upon all things, not just organics?
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillMechanical.stages.0.label: Little effect
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillMechanical.stages.1.label: Awakened
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillMechanical.stages.2.label: Illuminated
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillMechanical.stages.3.label: Enlightened
LanguageData.ATR_FractalPillMechanical.stages.4.label: Transcendant
